events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 1st involving their sedan and another car at a traffic intersection.
The claim was categorized under auto accident following review of customer report mentioning car accident damage to the front bumper and windshield.
An agent specialized in auto accident claims was assigned to handle this case promptly to assist the customer with their claim process.
Customer received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is currently under review by the claims department.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and a police accident report to support the auto accident claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos showing vehicle damage and the official accident report from police.
Investigation into the cause and fault of the auto accident officially began with review of submitted evidence and witness statements.
The investigation concluded confirming the liability and extent of damage to the vehicle consistent with customer's account of accident.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer based on repair estimates and policy coverage following completion of accident investigation.
Customer replied agreeing to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and assistance received.
The auto accident claim was officially approved, authorizing payment processing for vehicle repairs as per policy terms.
Payment for the approved claim was issued directly to the authorized auto repair shop to cover the cost of fixing the customer's car.
After confirming repair completion and payment, the auto accident claim was successfully closed and all related documentation archived.
